name: Spinny Plate
description:
Instructions:

Tap the corresponding key to spin the plate.

Hold and release the key to make the plate jump.

Don't spin the plates too fast or they will fly off.

Keep the plates spinning for as long as possible.

Story:

After spending decades studying under the circus masters around the globe you grew tired of their orthodox and predictable techniques. You heard rumors of an ancient god of chaos worshiped by a long lost civilisation who can grant any wish if you can best him. Desperate for forbidden plate spinning knowledge you set off into the jungle.

Also spinning plates is a metaphor for life or something ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 

Tools:

Unity

sfxr

GarageBand

Bug

Sometimes the bombs get stuck on the plates, can't fix it now ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 

Maybe after the jam.

Workaround - Try and catch the bombs in mid air and jump a lot.
